comment: /** * Find a user by the given ID * * @param id * the ID of the user * @return the user, or null if user not found. */
code: /** * Find a user by the given ID * * @param id * the ID of the user * @return the user, or null if user not found. */ User findUser(Integer id).

comment: /**  * Find all users  *  * @return a collection of all users  */
code: /**  * Find all users  *  * @return a collection of all users  */ Collection<User> findUsers().

comment: /**  * Update the given user  *  * @param user  *            the user  */
code: /**  * Update the given user  *  * @param user  *            the user  */ void updateUser(User user).
